7.9.19  6:31 pm   What's up with your song "die"? It spreads a very negative message, and is thoroughly unpleasant as a music piece. If you don't mind my asking, why did you make it, and what went through your heas when you did?




Unrelated, but I also wanted to say that I loved ],]], and ]]]. 

     it's like when someone submits a long question to this page telling us all about how many vast confusing challenges they are having when trying to do a long project. you are looking at the starting point of the exact solution(s) i always describe in response to those questions

     make an interesting song

     yes

      or sticking to the notes/question/anagram and other sections of this website for written expression?

7.9.19  4:26 pm   how to eat vitamins

     you you must flatten them out first

7.9.19  4:18 pm   Are you a completely self taught musician or do you have formal training?

     all the magical elements of music (that's 100%) i taught/developed my self. i was also able to garner a significant amount of real-world literacy by occasional observation, at a peculiarly high retension rate

      Read the bio but I dont know if space julliard has a website to check the alum list.

     the what

7.9.19  4:17 pm   what about violin 

     difficult the play in tune

7.9.19  3:55 pm   How did you make your website?

     it's really just like making a sandwich. you take a couple pieces of bread mixed with a little bit of non-bread, and throw it on the floor

     you could try doing shorter projects

     you must use pants

     what a peculiar idea

     no

     automation

     mashing it against something silly, creating a mold of the silliness, to carry with you in earnest

     just stop doing loops and see what you're left with

7.9.19  1:18 am   7.8.19  6:06 pm what if i don't know anything about actually playing piano

     then there's only 1 way to find out

      ehwbdhwbqdhbdnkjsegnsifhnrdn i hate this i just wanna do the fun stuff i can't focus on doing the necessary stuff because i just want to get to the FUN STUFF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! JFIESNGHDNFBDFG AHHHHHHH AHHHHHHH AHHHHHHH THIS SUCKS BECAUSE MUSIC CHASES ME 24/7 BUT IT'S TOO INTIMIDATING SO IT SCARES ME AWAY what do i do thxxxxxxxxxxxx it's fun from the very beginning.

     each note makes a different sound. what could be more fun than that

7.9.19  1:02 am   Which empire should I rule first

     evil

7.8.19  11:19 pm   what is most important in life?

     having a parachute, but not on the way down, it's important that you have the parachute on the way up, to prevent you from getting too high too fast

7.8.19  9:13 pm   any thoughts on how to stop comparing oneself to others in music/life? I tried mustard already (it's killing me, man)

     flip it up, start comparing them to you

7.8.19  8:35 pm   what does it mean when there's a ' after a chord? like i saw Db'' today does it just mean two octaves up

     if the lines are really big and slanted, it means the whole band stops and waits for something (pizza delivery? etc). if the marks are very tiny and it's hand written, i can only speculate that it actually says like -7 or something but they scribbled it too small. (?) or could be specks / flecks, of debris or other contaminatory substance

7.8.19  7:49 pm   Are you a ghost

     close, but not quite. i am a gameshow host

7.8.19  7:35 pm   what are some lessons u learned by being a guest in h3podcast that you would give as tips to someone going to their first podcast as a guest?

     don't name search the show on twitter the night before

     oh too relate

7.8.19  7:00 pm   where could one ascertain that patch you use on your keyboard for all the improv videos? i know you're wary of people asking what gear you use cause we think it'll be like a sound-like-bill-wurtz all-included pack, so i promise i will utilize it to play in as many different ways i can think of

     at guitar center in approximately 2008

7.8.19  6:24 pm   how do you deal with existential dread

     book tour!

7.8.19  6:06 pm   are what fingers play what notes (piano/keyboard-wise) on scales etc. as important as people make it out to be?

     there's only 1 way to find out

      can't i just play it how i feel most comfortable and what i think is the most efficient way?

     only if you think you're smart

      i'm trying really hard to learn how to actually make sense of music so i can replicate songs and create my own

     one thing that can strengthen intuitive fingering is to spend some 7 hour afternoons with the instrument, off book, free playing (no pre-written content)

7.8.19  5:55 pm   hello, i've finally got past my fear and started writing some music. the stuff I've shown to people, they've said it's not bad, but I'm scared to open up any further in fear of people not liking it as it's a sort of reflection of myself. do you have any advice for this? what brought you to start sharing your music with others?

     one thing i would never recommend doing is showing someone a song directly. the alternative which i do recommend is putting it somewhere and waiting for them to choose to listen to it at their own discretion, without your supervision

     let me see

     actually the wasp will probably move out first

7.8.19  12:31 pm   I noticed that you expressed interest in the Swift language in a recent question. A Bill Wurtz iOS app would be pretty cool, it could make use of a notification feature for any sort of new content and provide yet another handy platform for that content. Do you have something like that in mind,

     hopefully something vastly more different

     or another app idea, or just simply think knowing the language would be a useful skill to have in your back pocket?

     i was thinking inside jacket pocket

7.8.19  11:25 am   7.3.19  11:16 am (im a different person) do the e and p stand for edited and published? (i asked another one before this and i thought it was 'picked' and 'edited' but actually looked at the dates and figured i was wrong lol)

     yes. i was thinking 'posted' but same thing

7.8.19  7:48 am   there are no more questions to ask

     oh darn

7.8.19  6:51 am   were you a night owl in late 2010/early 2011?

     not an owl, but i worked mostly at night, for logistical reasons which were relevant at the time

7.8.19  5:40 am   as I try to type this up it seems stupider because I can't quite figure out how to word it properly to make the distinction I'm worried about clear.

But do you think chords have functions, or is it just notes that are functional?

     it's the whole sound combined, including any cognitive visual and/or linguistic information, which will overall have the true function

      And chords that have a lot of notes with a certain function end up functioning like that because on average the set of notes ends up functioning like the function that is most common amongst the notes?

     it's more relative than that. it's more about the relationships to each other

     Like, is V7 dominant because V7 is dominant? Or is V7 dominant because 7, 2, and 4 are dominant-function-sounding notes in the scale and they make up the majority of the V7 chord?

     to be honest i have no idea why the word dominant is used to describe that particular chord. if anything really describes it most, i'd call it 'twangy', and it particularly describes the relationship of (for example) b and f notes (in G7), and more specifically, if you put G bass under that, it's called G7. the b+f creates the twang (due to their harsh relationship), and the bass on G makes it sound like a G major chord. with the twang

7.8.19  2:43 am   i want to follow a certain moral/morals but i struggle to find the same passion i did before for them. it's like i lost sight of the end of the tunnel. do you know how to get it back?

     it will find you, new and improved. it's looking for you
